EmailTemplate.description: Manufacturers for DuPont™ NOMEX® Industrial - Apparel
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ NOMEX® Manufacturers for Industrial Apparel
EmailTemplate.subject: Manufacturers for DuPont™ NOMEX® Industrial Apparel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex®.
DuPont makes the Nomex® fiber. We have customers that take our fiber to manufacture for Nomex® Industrial Apparel.
Industrial Apparel made with Nomex® Fibers Check out products available from these manufacturers on Nomex® SafeSPEC™ (add link):
www.safespec.nomex.com

Below is the web address of a list of companies that manufacture for Nomex® Industrial Apparel. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=2&prodNum=2
DuPont Protection Solutions This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
